cards.name: Sell 5 Steel
cards.description: Sell 5 <sprite name="steel"/> from your stores for gold.

cards.name: Buy 5 Steel
cards.description: Buy 5 <sprite name="steel"/> from the caravans.

cards.name: Sell 5 Leather
cards.description: Sell 5 <sprite name="leather"/> from your stores for gold.

cards.name: Buy 5 Leather
cards.description: Buy 5 <sprite name="leather"/> from the caravans.

cards.name: Sell 5 Mounts
cards.description: Sell 5 <sprite name="mounts"/> from your stores for gold.

cards.name: Buy 5 Mounts
cards.description: Buy 5 <sprite name="mounts"/> from the caravans.

cards.name: Sell 5 Iron
cards.description: Sell 5 <sprite name="iron"/> from your stores for gold.

cards.name: Buy 5 Iron
cards.description: Buy 5 <sprite name="iron"/> from the caravans.

cards.name: Sell 5 Timber
cards.description: Sell 5 <sprite name="timber"/> from your stores for gold.

cards.name: Buy 5 Timber
cards.description: Buy 5 <sprite name="timber"/> from the caravans.

cards.name: Sell 5 Mithril
cards.description: Sell 5 <sprite name="mithril"/> from your stores for gold.

cards.name: Buy 5 Mithril
cards.description: Buy 5 <sprite name="mithril"/> from the caravans.

cards.name: Assassinate Character
cards.description: Attempt to kill an enemy character in this hex; the agent returns to capital and may be wounded.

cards.name: Wound Character
cards.description: Attempt to wound an enemy character here; the agent returns to capital.

cards.name: Double Character
cards.description: Turn an enemy character here into your double agent.

cards.name: Undouble Character
cards.description: Turn an enemy character here into your double agent.

cards.name: Increase Loyalty
cards.description: Raise the loyalty of the population center in this hex.

cards.name: Decrease Loyalty
cards.description: Lower the loyalty of the population center in this hex.

cards.name: Attack
cards.description: Lead your army to attack enemy armies or population centers in this hex.

cards.name: Increase Fortifications
cards.description: Upgrade the fortification level of your population center here.

cards.name: Cast Darkness
cards.description: Obscure the area around your hex from enemy sight.

cards.name: Cast Light
cards.description: Reveal the area around your hex.

cards.name: Conjure Mounts
cards.description: Create 1-3 <sprite name="mounts"/> at a friendly or aligned population center here.

cards.name: Curse
cards.description: Damage an enemy character in your hex with dark magic.

cards.name: Oh, Elbereth!
cards.description: Smite an enemy character here; Nazgul are also halted.

cards.name: Return To Capital
cards.description: Teleport this character back to your capital (not available to army commanders).

cards.name: Reveal Pc
cards.description: Expose a hidden population center in this hex.

cards.name: Scry Area
cards.description: Reveal a random unseen hex and its surroundings.

cards.name: Teleport
cards.description: Blink to a random explored hex and reveal tiles based on mage skill.

cards.name: WizardsLaugh
cards.description: Clear doubles on allied characters here or reduce loyalty of a hostile/neutral PC.

cards.name: Heal
cards.description: Heal a wounded allied or aligned character in your hex.

cards.name: Fireworks
cards.description: Shift this PC's loyalty using fireworks (up if aligned, down if hostile).

cards.name: Find Artifact
cards.description: Search this hex for hidden artifacts and claim one if found.

cards.name: Scry Artifact
cards.description: Reveal a hidden artifact's location and show its details.

cards.name: Steal Gold
cards.description: Steal gold from the current population center.

cards.name: Steal Iron
cards.description: Steal up to your agent rating in <sprite name="iron"/> from the current population center.

cards.name: Steal Leather
cards.description: Steal <sprite name="leather"/> from the current population center.

cards.name: Steal Mithril
cards.description: Steal <sprite name="mithril"/> from the current population center.

cards.name: Steal Mounts
cards.description: Steal <sprite name="mounts"/> from the current population center.

cards.name: Steal Timber
cards.description: Steal <sprite name="timber"/> from the current population center.

cards.name: Haste
cards.description: Refund movement so this non-army commander can move farther this turn.

cards.name: Scout Area
cards.description: Reveal the surrounding hexes.

cards.name: Block
cards.description: Engage a selected enemy army in this hex (no additional effect yet).

cards.name: Courage
cards.description: Encourage a friendly army here for several turns.

cards.name: Halt
cards.description: Stop a non-army enemy character in this hex from acting or moving next turn.

cards.name: Ice Storm
cards.description: Freeze an enemy army in this hex, halting it for a turn.

cards.name: Wizard's Fire
cards.description: Burn an enemy army in your hex, causing casualties.

cards.name: Words Of Dispair
cards.description: Inflict magical casualties on an enemy army sharing your hex.

cards.name: You Shall Not Pass!
cards.description: Halt an enemy character in this hex; Balrogs also take damage.

cards.name: Hear Stories
cards.description: Gather rumours based on your emissary skill.

cards.name: State Allegiance
cards.description: At an aligned NPC capital, swear allegiance to recruit them if their conditions are met.

cards.name: Perceive Danger
cards.description: Reveal the nearest enemy army and the nearby area.

cards.name: Transfer Artifact
cards.description: Give a transferable artifact to a friendly character in this hex.

cards.name: Steal Artifact
cards.description: Attempt to steal a transferable artifact from an enemy character in this hex.

cards.name: Sabotage Storage
cards.description: Sabotage two different types of stores in the target population center.

cards.name: Sabotage Port
cards.description: Sabotage the port in the target population center (requires agent 4).

cards.name: Destroy Port
cards.description: Destroy the port in the target population center (requires commander 3).

cards.name: Remove Port
cards.description: Remove the port from your own population center (requires commander 1).

cards.name: Destroy Fortifications
cards.description: Attempt to reduce the fortifications of an enemy population center by one level.

cards.name: Remove Fortifications
cards.description: Reduce your own fortifications by one level.

cards.name: Siege Population
cards.description: Lay siege to an enemy population center to reduce its population. Catapults improve success.

cards.name: Duel
cards.description: Challenge an enemy character in this hex to a duel.

cards.name: Refuse Duel
cards.description: Refuse duels for the next turn. Challengers will be turned away.

cards.name: MirrorOfGaladriel
cards.description: Reveal individual unseen hexes across the map. Revealed hex count scales with mage rank up to 7.

cards.name: Dawn
cards.description: Event: Grants Courage to all Free People units for 1 turn and dispels Doors of Night.
